sociopatterns.visualization.plot_average_degree_group module¶

sociopatterns.visualization.plot_average_degree_group.plot_avg_degree_group(attr_degree_list, measures)¶

Plot boxplot for the average degrees

Plots the average degree for every attribute. It also plots the average from all degrees and the standard deviation

Parameters

  • attr_degree_list (list)

  • measures (list)

Returns

Return type

None

sociopatterns.visualization.plot_probability_distribution.plot_contact_duration(list_x_y, color_list, marker_list, label_list)¶

Plots the probability distribution of the contact duration

Plots the values of the probability on the y-axis and the values of the contact duration Delta T on the x-axis.

Parameters

  • color_list (list)

  • marker_list (list)

  • label_list (list)

Returns
